text: Pintail Island is one of the uninhabited Canadian arctic islands in Nunavut, Canada. It is located at the mouth of Chesterfield Inlet. The island is approximately from the Inuit hamlet of Chesterfield Inlet. ==References== Category:Islands of Chesterfield Inlet Category:Uninhabited islands of Kivalliq Region Category:Islands of the Canadian Arctic Archipelago
title: Pintail Island
